entry.title: Ingrid is selling gorditas, chile relleno, and chocoflan next...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

Ingrid is selling gorditas, chile relleno, and chocoflan next week to raise money to pay for legal costs associated with her immigration case. Ingrid has been in sanctuary in Boulder for almost four years now—longer than her daughter has been alive. You can support her by buying food next weekend. (and share this post if that’s not an option!) tinyurl.com/solidarity-meals-10-24

entry.content:
Sanctuary4All ColoradoSanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

Gaby and Lupe are selling food this weekend to raise money for legal fees related to family members’ court cases. Please support by buying food, donating, and sharing this graphic. tinyurl.com/solidaritymeals-10-17 #SolidarityNotCharity #SolidarityMeals

entry.title: Sanctuary4All ColoradoSanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.Pictured here is Gaby’s family. She’s trying to raise $10,000 to...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All ColoradoSanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

Pictured here is Gaby’s family. She’s trying to raise $10,000 to appeal the decision made in her husband’s case. He was recently deported, and she’s been supporting their family on her own since. You can help by purchasing cebiche from her. tinyurl.com/solidaritymeals-10-17

entry.title: Sanctuary4All ColoradoDenver Public SchoolsContinuing with our celebration of Hispanic Heritage Month, Luna Baez-Vizguerra, an 11th-grade...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All ColoradoDenver Public Schools

Continuing with our celebration of Hispanic Heritage Month, Luna Baez-Vizguerra, an 11th-grade student at Kunsmiller Creative Arts Academy shares how her mother is her cultural hero. Luna writes, “my mom is seen as a symbol of hope for the immigrant community.” Read more ➡️ bit.ly/30kTs4Z

entry.title: *** Sigue en Español**Spanish Below*** Individuals,...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

*** Sigue en Español**Spanish Below***

Individuals, organizations and elected officials: Tell Biden to free families in Sanctuary. Please Sign!
Friends, we are asking Vice President Joe Biden to commit to liberating people currently living in Sanctuary if elected president this November. Please join us in fighting for Sanctuary Leaders and the communities they represent.
Individuals Sign here: https://actionnetwork.org/…/ask-joe-biden-to-commit-to-fre…/...
Organizations Sign here: http://thesanctuarycollective.org/organization-sign-on-lett…
Elected Officials, Candidates, & Delegates Sign here: http://thesanctuarycollective.org/elected-officials-sign-on…
=====================================================================
Individuos, organizaciones y funcionarios electos: Dígale a Biden que libere a las familias en Sanctuary. ¡Por favor firma!
Amigos, estamos pidiendo al vicepresidente Joe Biden que se comprometa a liberar a las personas que actualmente viven en Santuario si son elegidas presidente en noviembre. Únase a nosotros en la lucha por los líderes del santuario y las comunidades que representan.
Individuos Firme aquí: https://actionnetwork.org/…/ask-joe-biden-to-commit-to-fre…/

Organizaciones Firme aquí: https://bit.ly/CartadeOrganizaciones

Funcionarios Electos, Candidatos y Delegados Firme aquí: https://bit.ly/cartadefuncionarios

entry.title: https://www.facebook.com/244429502833301/posts/459029841373265/
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

https://www.facebook.com/244429502833301/posts/459029841373265/

Abolish ICE Denver

URGENT ALERT (English translation follows)

Alerta familias del Distrito de DPS tenemos información de que ICE está utilizando nuevas tácticas haciendo llamadas... haciéndose pasar por maestros pidiendo su información para el programa de visitas en casa por favor de no dar ningún tipo de información verifiquen en la escuela de sus hijos si saben de alguna familia que les han echo estas llamadas haciéndose pasar por los maestros de sus hijos déjenos saber o si alguien a sido detenido bajo este engañó contácteme para proveer apoyo teléfono #720 329 06 57 esta información a sido confirmada por Susana Cordova Superintendents de DPS y nuestra responsabilidad es prevenir a nuestras comunidades y familias . Recuerden tener el número de respuesta rápida en caso de interacción con ICE es el #1844 864 83 41 opción #1 para redadas daremos seguimiento a esto y no compartan información sin verificar con los maestros de sus hijos y la escuela

________________________________

ALERT: Families of Denver Public School district:
We have information that ICE is using new tactics: making calls posing as teachers asking for their information for the home visits program. Please do not give any type of information! Check with your children's school!

If you know of any family who have received these calls from people posing as the teachers of their children, let us know; or if someone has been arrested under this deception contact Jeanette Vizguerra! This information has been confirmed by Susana Cordova, Superintendent of DPS.

Our responsibility is to protect our communities and families. Remember to have the quick response number in case of interaction with ICE: (844) 864-8341 option #1 for raids

See More
